title: Angela Bassett and Christina Hendricks attend The Rape Foundation brunch
text:
They're two actresses who never put a foot wrong forward when it comes to the red carpet.

And Sunday was no different for Angela Basset, 61, and Christina Hendricks, 44, who both flaunted their chic and vibrant style while in attendance of The Rape Foundation brunch in Los Angeles.

The ladies both opted for shades of yellow as they led the stars for the important cause.

Bright for a good cause: Angela Bassett and Christina Hendricks showcased their bright and bold looks on Sunday morning when they attended The Rape Foundation's brunch in Los Angeles

Angela proved age was just a number when she flaunted her incredibly toned physique in her gorgeous off-the-shoulder frock.

Her dress featured a slit in the middle and was cinched in at the waist.

She teamed the look with a pair of platform peep-toe heels that were of a bronze color.

Age-defying: Angela proved age was just a number when she flaunted her incredibly toned physique in her gorgeous off-the-shoulder frock

Angela styled her hair out and opted for a dewy makeup look. Her glam featured contoured cheekbones and a nude lip.

Christina opted for a yellow dress with cats on it.

She teamed the long-sleeved ensemble with a pair of nude heels and accessorised with tinted shades.

Gorgeous: She teamed the look with a pair of platform peep-toe heels that were of a bronze color

Matching: Angela and Christina both opted for yellow style ensembles

Beautiful: Christina styled her auburn hair out into curls and completed her look with a red lip

Christina styled her auburn hair out into curls and completed her look with a red lip.

Also in attendance was Elizabeth Olsen.

She stunned in a printed maxi dress that was pleated in its length and featured frilly sleeves.

Unique: Christina opted for a yellow dress with cats on it

Natural beauty: Also in attendance was Elizabeth Olsen. She stunned in a printed maxi dress that was pleated in its length and featured frilly sleeves

Fresh and ready for the day: And While Courteney Cox, Jennifer Aniston and Matt Le Blanc had a mini Friends reunion on Saturday night, David Schwimmer was perhaps getting an early night's rest ahead of the event

Elizabeth used a large belt to cinch in her waist and styled her blonde hair out into loose waves.

Her glam was kept dewy and luminous with a brush of mascara, sweep of blush and nude glossy lip.

And While Courteney Cox, Jennifer Aniston and Matt Le Blanc had a mini Friends reunion on Saturday night, David Schwimmer was perhaps getting an early night's rest ahead of the event.

Pals: One point saw Angela and David embracing in a hug

Ladies! Angela and Christina found a moment to pose with Gail Abarbanel

David opted for a two-piece suit complete with a maroon colored tie on Sunday morning.

Eric McCormack and Janet Holden was also there for the morning brunch.

The pair have been married since 1997 and are parents to Finnigan Holden McCormack, 17.
